TopicTitle: Forum Mobile platform no prefix option for suggestions.

Articles.Content:
Just tried to post a thread in suggestions for my sons birthday wish.

But on my android phone running chrome, the prefix option does not show on the mobile platform.

I switched to my main box and got it done, but just letting you guys know that no "thread prefix" option is show in the mobile version of vb
We're aware of the issue... not sure much can be done about it at the moment, though.
